From GrowthInGroups

if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11731803320/job/32682626852)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/11731803320/job/32682626425)
Let's add a note somewhere that in abelian groups, the bound can be improved (and a link to that thm, presuming you've proved it)
This proof looks essentially duplicated from `small_neg_pos_pos`, is there really no way to use mulOp to clean this up?
I'm slightly surprised this isn't a one-liner with nlinarith

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(Combinatorics/Additive): small tripling implies small powers
